The data analyzd below are house trips related to and sponsored by tech organizations.

## Data Setup

Load libraries

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
options(scipen=999)
# install.packages("ggrepel")
# install.packages('ggthemes')
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
library(ggthemes)
library(tidycensus)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggrepel)
library(tigris)
library(sf)
library(readr)
```

Load Data

```{r}
#Load data
tech_trips_house <- read_csv("house_trips_tech/tech_trips_house.csv")

View(tech_trips_house)
```
## Data Cleaning

```{r}
#Clean column names and change year, doc id and district columns to a character column
tech_trips_house <- tech_trips_house |> 
  clean_names() |> 
  mutate(year = as.character(year)) |> 
  mutate(doc_id = as.character(doc_id)) |> 
  mutate
  
```
